bibl.seg: Marianne Eaton-Krauss, Cäcilia Fluck & Gertrud J.M. van Loon (edd.), Egypt 1350 BC - AD 1800. Art Historical and Archaeological Studies for Gawdat Gabra = Sprachen und Kulturen des christlichen Orients. 20.
Wiesbaden, L. Reichert, 2011, 8°, 156 pp., 1 portrait, 39 figg., 20 pll. coul. ISBN 978-3-89500-820-7. €59.

Pp. 7: M.E.-Kr., C.Fl. & G.J.M.V.L., Preface; - 13-16: Martin Krause, Laudatio; - 17-22: Lucia Langener, The Publications of Gawdat Gabra; - 23-25: Samiha Abd el-Shaheed, The Contributions of Dr. Gawdat Gabra to Coptic Studies.
